<title level="1" right="Trait">[Static](/Traits.aspx?ID=288)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 254</row>

The physical nature of a plane with this trait can’t be changed in any way.
name: Static
